settings.question: Why do you want to warn people about niacin in Sport formula before you give them a packet?
settings.answer1: People may feel warm and tingly and not understand what's going on
settings.answer2: We dont want someone to have a niacin flush and not understand why
settings.answer3: Niacin can cause itching and flushing of skin and may be alarming to somebody that doesn't know

settings.heading: Watch the video to unlock the question
settings.question: Why should you warn somebody to breathe through their nose while the powder is melting in their mouth to avoid inhaling the powder and coughing?
settings.answer1: Warning them to breath through their nose while powder is in their mouth will help to avoid coughing and getting powder on their shirt
settings.answer2: When powder melts in your mouth fully, it absorbs directly in to the bloodstream for fast results without water
settings.answer3: If the powder is melting your mouth, you feel the effects fast and you don't need water which is super convenient, so breath through your nose if powder is in your mouth melting.

settings.question: What does the "waist-up family friendly picture" featuring you and the product need to be like?
settings.answer1: A) Your first picture should be energetic with a big smile?
settings.answer2: B) Have a clean background to feature your smile and the products better?
settings.answer3: C) Have you wearing the new t-shirt, holding your products and smiling?
